definition: to access/to transfer passengers between two railway lines
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
variegated/heterogeneous/to refute/to contradict/to ship by barge/a barge/a lighter (ship)
shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines

sentences.english: There are also two supports and connections to receive future footbridges .
sentences.chinese: 亦有兩個支座及連接點接駁日後的行人天橋。

sentences.english: May I use the satellite network telephone from my stateroom?
sentences.chinese: 我可以在艙房裏使用接駁衛星電話嗎？

sentences.english: Where can I take an airport shuttle bus?
sentences.chinese: 在哪裏可以搭機場接駁巴士？

sentences.english: After the guarantee welding the connection position does not appear crooked.
sentences.chinese: 保證焊接後接駁位不出現歪扭。

sentences.english: A transit train of the Candy world 2005 Festival.
sentences.chinese: 2005年世界糖果文化節活動的遊客接駁列車。

sentences.english: Melted frost voluntarily evaporates, no need drainpipe.
sentences.chinese: 化霜水自動蒸發，無需接駁排水管。

sentences.english: Your call connecting tone has been changed to "Friends by SingTel" .
sentences.chinese: 您的電話接駁鈴聲已經改變了新加坡電信以“朋友”。

sentences.english: The airport shuttle bus to the remote parking lot comes every 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 從機場到遠處停車場的接駁巴士每十分鐘來一班。

sentences.english: After arriving Zhunan train station, you can take the shuttle bus to NHRI Zhunan campus.
sentences.chinese: 到達竹南火車站後，可搭乘接駁車前往本院院區。

sentences.english: A very short track between Yun-Hsian Amusement and the cable car station, Wu-Lai, Taipei County.
sentences.chinese: 烏來雲仙樂園與纜車站之間的索道接駁臺車。

sentences.english: A most common method of connecting add-on printed circuit boards to computer hardware.
sentences.chinese: 在電腦硬件上，它是接駁擴展印刷線路板的常用方法。

sentences.english: A most common method of connecting add-on printed circuit boards to computer hardware.
sentences.chinese: 在電腦硬體上，它是接駁擴展印刷線路板的常用方法。

sentences.english: For me, the mobile Internet is when I can hook up my laptop to the net on the road.
sentences.chinese: 只有可接駁筆記本電腦時我纔會選擇用手機上網。

sentences.english: The shuttle will carry you from the car park to the office in three minutes.
sentences.chinese: 這輛接駁車在三分鐘內就會將你從停車場載到公司。

sentences.english: It provides support and connection to connect a proposed footbridge across Yau Man Street.
sentences.chinese: 以接駁一條日後橫跨祐民街的擬建行人天橋。

definition: to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
parking spot/unloading point/garage place/stand for taxi
